definitions.definition: A native or resident of Galilee .

( historical ) A zealous follower of Judas of Galilee , who fiercely resented the taxation of the Romans , and whose violence contributed to induce the latter to vow the extermination of the whole race.
( by extension , sometimes derogatory ) A Christian .

main_definition: A native or resident of Galilee .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A zealous follower of Judas of Galilee , who fiercely resented the taxation of the Romans , and whose violence contributed to induce the latter to vow the extermination of the whole race.
( by extension , sometimes derogatory ) A Christian .
